sections.paragraph: + The sons of Rephaiah appear among the descendants of Zerubbabel in (1 Chronicles 3:21) + A Simeonite chieftain in the reign of Hezekiah. (1 Chronicles 4:42) (B.C. 727.) + Son of Tola the son of Issachar. (1 Chronicles 7:2) + Son of Binea, and descendant of Saul. (1 Chronicles 9:43) + The son of Hur, and ruler of a portion of Jerusalem. (Nehemiah 3:9) (B.C. 441.)
